original: Lundgren, Vilhelm Bruno, teol. lic., folkskolinspektör, Göteborg, f. 6/10/85 i Gbg av järnv ibokhåll, Frans Adolf L. o. Mimmi Peterson. G. 37 m. Elia Margrethe Schulstad. — Studiex. 05, teol. fil. ex. v. Gbgs högsk. 06, teol. kand. i Lund 09, teol. lic. 14, prästv. 17. Studires. t. Norge, Danm., Tyskl., Schweiz, Österr., Frankr. o. Engl. E. o. adj. v. Lunds folksk isem. 14-16, lär. v. Lunds h. lärov. f. fl. 16, folksk linsp. i Landskrona 17-20, i Gbg sed. 21, v. pastor i Härslöf, Landskrona, Asmundstorp o. Tofta, v. kommin. i Lunds stadsförs. Led. av styr. f. Landskrona husmoderssk. 20, lär. v. Sigrid Rudebecks gymn. f. fl. 22, led. av styr. f. fören. Barnens dag i Gbg, Gbgs scoutkår o. Gbgs ålderdomshem, ordf. i styr. f. Gbgs ’skolkökssem., i lokalstyr. av Riksfören. f. svenskh. bev. i uti., Gbgs o. Boh. 1. sångarförb. sed. 38 o. i Gbgs allm. körförb. 34-36, v. ordf. i styr. f. Folkund ivisn. främj. LVO.
translated: Lundgren, Vilhelm Bruno, theologian licentiate, school inspector, Gothenburg, b. 6/10/85 in Gothenburg to a railway accountant, Frans Adolf L. and Mimmi Peterson. Married in 1937 to Elia Margrethe Schulstad. — Completed studies 1905, theology and philosophy examination at Gothenburg University in 1906, theology candidate in Lund in 1909, theology licentiate in 1914, ordained as a priest in 1917. Studied in Norway, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, France, and England. Teacher and assistant at Lund's primary school seminar 1914-1916, teacher at Lund's High School from 1916, school inspector in Landskrona 1917-1920, in Gothenburg since 1921, assistant pastor in Härslöf, Landskrona, Asmundstorp, and Tofta, vicar in Lund city parish. Member of the board of the Landskrona Home Economics School in 1920, teacher at Sigrid Rudebeck's gymnasium from 1922, member of the board for the Children's Day Association in Gothenburg, Gothenburg Scout Corps, and Gothenburg Old Age Home, chairman of the board for the Gothenburg School Kitchen Association, local board member of the National Association for the Promotion of Swedishness Abroad, Gothenburg and Bohus choral federation since 1938, deputy chairman of the board for the People’s Enlightenment Promotion Association. Awarded with LVO.

worksFor.name: Riksfören. f. svenskh. bev. i uti.
